Managing Passengers’ Experience Through Mobile Moments. Progetto commissionato da SEA Areoporti Milano

Academy of Marketing 2014 Best Paper in Track - Nigel Williams, Alessandro Inversini, Dimitrios Buhalis, Nicole Ferdinand, Bournemouth University Social Media and Festivals as Destination Marketing Tool: A study on Twitter Conversations sponsored by Wiley, presented by Steve Hardman.

IFITT Journal Paper of The Year - Williams, N. L., Inversini, A., Buhalis, D., & Ferdinand, N. (2015). Community crosstalk: an exploratory analysis of destination and festival eWOM on Twitter. Journal of Marketing Management, 31 (9-10), 1113-1140.

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Managing Director TicinoInfo SA – Regional Tourism Technology Competence Center Management of a small company (7 employees) owned by local destination marketing organizations and hotels associations for the introduction of innovative technological based solutions in the field of tourism, hospitality and events. Fund raising, project management, resources management.
Social Media Consultant Festival del Film Locarno (Switzerland) Strategy design and management of Festival del Film di Locarno social media (Twitter, Facebook, Youtube) channels.

Uncredit 4 Tourism - Relatore per una serie (10) di convegni sul tema 'tecnologie digitali nel turismo' sponsorizzati da UniCredit presso le camere di commercio italiane interessate. Relatore TOURISM TALK: l'evento dedicato al Turismo per il 2016 Come l’innovazione digitale cambia il business dell’ospitalità.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Invited Lecturer - University of Eastern Finland, FUNTS network. Topic eTourism

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Principal Investigator EU-LLP Innovation in Rural Tourism (http://inrutou.eu/) - Life Long learning project about technological competences in rural tourism
Principal Investigator EU-LLP EUBike (http://eubike.bike) - Life Long learning project on continuous education in the field of bike tourism
